channel.title: BS2010 [Battlescape 2010 Remake] - Reliving RSPS
channel.description:
[center][b]BattleScape 2010/1 Remake[/b]
[b]Introduction:[/b]
we've had this plan of making Battlescape 2010 Remake for awhile so we have finally considered starting this project now. Battlescape had around 900-1000 active players back in 2010, but the players dropped slowly and slowly after newer versions of Battlescape which made some players quit/leave it for good. I've seen so many people just wanting the Oldschool feeling back and the prime times of RSPS and Battlescape, we've also had some famous youtubers wanting a Battlescape 2010 replica so here we are doing it. We will create together with our very experienced developers a replica of Battlescape 1/2010, so don't lose your hopes yet!
[b]Information:[/b]
- When you first log in, you will be located in Netitiznot (Home). - Change settings, such as HP bar, hitmarks, and fog from ingame. - PK against other players in the Wilderness, and gain EP for extra rewards on top of the other player’s risked items. -Stake other players, choosing what can and can't be used in the fight. - Pest Control is a Zombie Survival minigame insipred from CoD instead. Explore the God Wars Dungeon, and fight bosses such as General Graardor. - The Kalphite Queen has both forms which work flawlessly. - You can kill Barrelchest to acquire a Barrelchest Anchor. - Unlock the Lunar Magic spellbook - Play through a number of rounds to unlock different RFD gloves. - Fight against Mithril Dragons, and possibly gain a Dragon Fullhelm.

@Onur-163 wrote:

[center]BattleScape 2010/1 Remake

Introduction:

we’ve had this plan of making Battlescape 2010 Remake for awhile so we have finally considered starting this project now.
Battlescape had around 900-1000 active players back in 2010, but the players dropped slowly and slowly after newer versions of Battlescape which made some players quit/leave it for good.
I’ve seen so many people just wanting the Oldschool feeling back and the prime times of RSPS and Battlescape, we’ve also had some famous youtubers wanting a Battlescape 2010 replica so here we are doing it.
We will create together with our very experienced developers a replica of Battlescape 1/2010, so don’t lose your hopes yet!

Information:

  • When you first log in, you will be located in Netitiznot (Home).
  • Change settings, such as HP bar, hitmarks, and fog from ingame.
  • PK against other players in the Wilderness, and gain EP for extra rewards on top of the other player’s risked items.
    -Stake other players, choosing what can and can’t be used in the fight.
  • Pest Control is a Zombie Survival minigame insipred from CoD instead.
    Explore the God Wars Dungeon, and fight bosses such as General Graardor.
  • The Kalphite Queen has both forms which work flawlessly.
  • You can kill Barrelchest to acquire a Barrelchest Anchor.
  • Unlock the Lunar Magic spellbook
  • Play through a number of rounds to unlock different RFD gloves.
  • Fight against Mithril Dragons, and possibly gain a Dragon Fullhelm.
